titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to extend the date for making a gift tax qualified terminable interest property election.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/25/2006--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue regulations for granting extensions to taxpayers for making a gift tax qualified terminable interest property (QTIP) election.
